revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Mystery Egg |image = [[File:Mystery_Egg_Item.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Mystery Egg''. |use = Allows use of the [[Pokémon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]] |obtain = Defeat 10 Pokémon on [[Kanto#Routes|Kanto Route 5]] }} ===Description=== A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. This allows you to use the [[Pokémon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]] to help improve your Pokémon Attack. Some baby Pokémon can only be found through breeding, too! ===Acquisition=== Upon defeating 10 Pokémon in [[Kanto#Routes|Kanto Route 5]], Professor Oak will give the player the Mystery Egg allowing access to the [[Pokémon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]]. ===Effects=== Access to the [[Pokémon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]]

{{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
